00070     class range_finder {
00071     public:
00073         explicit range_finder(SUMOReal speed) : mySpeed(speed) { }
00074 
00076         bool operator()(const std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal> &range) {
00077             return mySpeed >= range.first && mySpeed < range.second;
00078         }
00079 
00080     private:
00081         SUMOReal mySpeed;
00082     };
